Texts.Eng:
Pegasi in equine folklore are known to be weather manipulators and great fliers. When the spacefaring technology developed, they started colonizing worlds and bending them to their rules. They're also known to be versatile warriors, using range to repel their enemies with ease.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% E. Regen. +^green;10^reset;% Speed, +^green;25^reset;% Jump. Fall Damage x^green;0.7^reset;, ^green;+60^reset; Oxygen
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Electricity, Cold
  ^cyan;Racial Ability^reset;: Pegasus Flight

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Volcanic and infernal: Health x^red;0.95^reset; and -^red;25^reset;% E. Regen.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  +^green;15%^reset; Crossbow, Grenade Launcher and Assault Rifle Mastery, +^green;10%^reset; Sniper Rifle Mastery.

^orange;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.9^reset;. +^red;20^reset;% Hunger Drain

^orange;Resistances^reset;:
  +^red;20^reset;% Ice and Electric, -^red;20^reset;% Physical, -^red;10^reset;% Fire ^red;-50^reset;% Knockback
